From logs it looks like instance reboot is failed. But as state shown in above logs instance state changed to 'running' even reboot failed.

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1188343 fixed issue of changing the  instance state to active (running) even before reboot operation success. Is it still issue?
title: Failed to reboot instance successfully with EC2

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
Got the same issue which caused check-tempest-dsvm-postgres-full failed. 
http://logs.openstack.org/50/123350/3/check/check-tempest-dsvm-postgres-full/02bb858
I think importance of defect should be increased.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~woodbor

comments.content: Gate bugs should be minimum High
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: Based on logstash it looks like the first hit was simetime over the weekend so around the 27th or 28th (we don't have any logstash data for that time frame)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: This isn't hitting in the gate anymore so dropping the priority.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Since we aren't seeing this anymore closing the bug. If you see this again feel free to re-open
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo
